verse_no:
स ईक्षतेमे नु लोका लोकपालान्नु सृजा इति॥ 
सोऽद्भ्य एव पुरुषं समुद्धृत्यामूर्च्छयत्‌ ॥

terms.लोकपालान् (lokapālān): rulers of the worlds (guardians of the worlds)

meaning: He contemplates these worlds and the rulers of the worlds, indeed, by creating them. He, after raising the person (individual soul) from them, alone causes him to ascend (attain liberation).
